subject: Never received order SSN2707
description_text: I need help because I never received my order. I'd like to request a reshipment or refund. Order #SSN2707 SF Express tracking number: SF6045928902397 The SF website says delivered and someone signed for it. This is not true or accurate. Please respond. Tony Mouriño 502-301-0696 ______________________________________________________________________ This electronic mail may contain information that is privileged, proprietary and confidential and/or exempt from disclosure under applicable law. conversations.body_text: Hello, the package has indeed been marked as delivered. Please check your front door and ask your family members and neighbors. Thank you for your cooperation.    https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045928902397

I have not received an update - just request emails for feedback. Please let me know when to expect my refund? I never received my product. It was never delivered. Tony Mouriño 502-301-0696 ______________________________________________________________________ This electronic mail may contain information that is privileged, proprietary and confidential and/or exempt from disclosure under applicable law. Hi Tony Mourino,     Have you checked all possible locations? The courier has confirmed the package has been delivered.
